The 2023 Annual Meeting on Phonology (AMP 2023) was held online on October 20-22 (not at Johns Hopkins University as originally planned). [AMP](https://blogs.umass.edu/amp-info/), founded in 2013, is held every Fall, and showcases high quality research in all areas of phonology.

## [Schedule (with links to abstracts/handouts/posters/slides)](schedule.qmd)

## Invited speakers

[Ellen Broselow](https://linguistics.stonybrook.edu/faculty/ellen.broselow/) (_Stony Brook University_)

[Laura Gwilliams](https://lauragwilliams.github.io/) (_Stanford University_)

[Jie Zhang](https://linguistics.ku.edu/people/jie-zhang) (_University of Kansas_)
